original_text: But these birds you must not eat: eagles, vultures, kites, owls, hawks, falcons, buzzards, ostriches, seagulls, storks, herons, pelicans, cormorants, hoopoes and bats.

sentences.original_text: But these birds you must not eat
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이 새들은 먹지 말아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: herons, pelicans, cormorants, hoopoes and bats
